reference: Brander, James A. and Barbara K. Spencer (1985) Export Subsidies and International Market Share Rivalry, Journal of International Economics 18, 83-100.

Ethier, Wilfred J. (1982), National and International Returns to Scale in the Modem Theory of International Trade, American Economic Review 72, 389-405.
Helpman, Elhanan, and Paul Krugman (1985), Market Structure and Foreign Trade (Cambridge: MIT Press).
Hertel, Thomas W. (1992), The `Procompetitive Effects of Trade Policy Reform in a Small, Open Economy, Purdue University Working Paper.

Markusen, James R. (1989), Trade in Producer Services and in Other Specialized, Intermediate Inputs, American Economic Review 85, 85-95.
